pullRequest.title: Make sure the application is shutdown properly in the shutdown hook
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also make sure the specified exit handler is invoked during SIGINT

nodes.bodyText: This was what I observed with the reproducer project in the issue
It was there before but I'm not sure it's a good idea to use an util coming from GraalVM svm artifact for such a low level thing.

commit.message:
Make sure the application is shutdown properly in the shutdown hook

Also make sure the specified exit handler is invoked during SIGINT

Fixes #11792
Do not return false positive on Darwin OS
